email_subject: Looking for the perfect camera for your summer vacation? (CNET SHOPPER)
email_body: The e-mail address for your subscription is qqqqqqqqqq-cnet-newsletters@spamassassin.taint.org. Did you know that ChannelOnline enables you to streamline your sales process by building quotes and orders online? Simply select a customer you've previously entered into ChannelOnline's database and their company information, and a customized price profile is automatically applied to their quote. You can add products as you search the product database and work on multiple quotes at once as you respond to different customer requests throughout the day. Sign up now to streamline your entire buying and selling chain. Tell me more about ChannelOnline.
